Kontakt

Sie möchten bei uns arbeiten?

Offene Stelle

Real estate agent
We are looking for a professional Real Estate Agent to be an intermediary between sellers and buyers. Real Estate Agent responsibilities include marketing listings and providing guidance to buyers and sellers. This is a great opportunity for someone looking to grow their career in real estate.
Real Estate Appraiser
We are looking for a diligent Real Estate Appraiser to produce credible and viable results for clients and other intended users. You will be responsible for aggregating, analysing, interpreting and reporting on appraisal data.
Das freut uns
Gerne erwarten wir Ihre kompletten Bewerbungsunterlagen (Motivationsschreiben, Lebenslauf, Arbeitszeugnisse, Diplome usw.).
